price: (14) No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.[1880]
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
